entities.name: showInfo
entities.description: A method to retrieve information about the database or table, with an optional extended information feature.

entities.name: showTablesInfo
entities.description: A method to retrieve information about the database tables, with an optional extended information feature.

entities.name: use
entities.description: A method to access a specific table within the database, providing an interface for querying and manipulation.

entities.name: create
entities.description: A method to create a new table in the database, allowing to define table name, schema, columns, and their properties.

entities.name: insert
entities.description: A method to insert data into a table, supporting single or multiple values insertion.

entities.name: find
entities.description: A method to retrieve values from a table, with support for conditions, joins, grouping, ordering, and pagination.

entities.name: SingleStoreClient
entities.description: A client for interacting with SingleStore databases, with optional management API access and AI functionality.

entities.name: AI
entities.description: A module to enable AI functionality within SingleStoreClient, requiring an OpenAI API key.

entities.name: organization
entities.description: A property of SingleStoreClient to get the current organization information.

entities.name: workspaceGroup
entities.description: A property of SingleStoreClient to manage workspace groups, allowing retrieval by ID or name.

relationships.description: The showInfo method retrieves information from the database.
The showTablesInfo method retrieves information from the database tables.
The use method provides access to a specific table within the database.
The create method allows for the creation of a new table in the database.
The insert method inserts data into a table.
The find method retrieves values from a table.
SingleStoreClient is used for interacting with SingleStore databases.
The AI module enables AI functionality for SingleStoreClient.
The organization property is a part of SingleStoreClient.
The workspaceGroup property is a part of SingleStoreClient.
